mean_cn: n. 【解剖学】阑尾，附属物，附录；  vt. 加附录于
mean_en: a small tube at the beginning of the large intestine that can be removed by surgery if it becomes infected
deformation_desc: appendix除了附录的意思，还表示阑尾哟~
sentence: There's a problem with his appendix so it will have to be removed.
sentence_trans: 他的阑尾出问题了，必须要切除。
